articles.title: Russia-Ukraine war at a glance: what we know on day 380 of the invasion - The Guardian
articles.description: Russian missile strikes on Ukraine leave at least nine dead; UN warns urgent action needed to protect Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant after power lost in attacks
articles.content: <li>Russia unleashed its largest missile bombardmentagainst Ukraine in three weeks in the early hours of Thursday, including six hypersonic missiles able to evade air defences. At least nine civilian… [+3295 chars]

articles.author: Neuroscience News
articles.title: Complex Learned Social Behavior Discovered in Bee’s Waggle Dance - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A bee's "waggle dance", an intricate series of motions that signals the location of critical resources to other bees, is improved by social learning and can be culturally transmitted.
articles.content:
Summary: A bee’s “waggle dance”, an intricate series of motions that signals the location of critical resources to other bees, is improved by social learning and can be culturally transmitted.
